DOC.brief_summary: Subjects compare single dose bioavailability Torrent 's Olmesartan medoxomil , Amlodipine Hydrochlorothiazide Tablets 40+10+25 mg Tribenzor® 40+10+25 mg Tablets Daichi Sankyo Inc , USA . Dosing period study separate washout period 22 day .
DOC.brief_title: BE Study Torrent 's Olmesartan Medoxomil , Amlodipine Hydrochlorothiazide Tab - Fed Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: An Open Label , Randomized , 2-period , 2- Treatment , 2-Sequence , Crossover , Single-dose Bioequivalence Study Olmesartan medoxomil , Amlodipine Hydrochlorothiazide Tablets contain Olmesartan medoxomil 40 mg , Amlodipine 10 mg Hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg ( Test Formulation , Torrent Pharmaceutical Ltd. , India ) Versus Tribenzor® 40+10+25 mg Tablets contain Olmesartan medoxomil 40 mg , Amlodipine 10 mg Hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg ( Reference , Daichi Sankyo Inc. , USA ) Healthy Human Volunteers Under Fed Condition .
DOC.criteria: Sex : male Age : 1845 year ( inclusive ) Volunteer BMI 1825 ( inclusive ) kg/m2 Healthy willing participate study . Volunteer willing adhere protocol requirement provide write informed consent . Preferably Nonsmokers The volunteer exclude study base follow criterion : Clinically relevant abnormality result laboratory screening evaluation . Clinically significant abnormal ECG Chest Xray . Systolic blood pressure le 110 mm Hg 140 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure le 70 mm Hg 90 mm Hg . Pulse rate less 60/minute 100/minute . Oral temperature le 95°F 99°F . Respiratory rate le 14/minute 18/minute History allergy test drug drug chemically similar drug investigation . History alcohol drug abuse Positive breath alcohol test Recent history kidney liver dysfunction . History consumption prescribe medication since last 14 day OTC medication since last 07 day begin study . Volunteers suffer chronic illness arthritis , asthma etc . History heart failure . HIV , HCV , HBsAg positive volunteer . Opiate , tetra hydrocannabinol , amphetamine , barbiturate , benzodiazepine , Cocaine positive volunteer base urine test . Volunteers suffer psychiatric ( acute chronic ) illness require medication . Administration study drug period 0 3 month entry study . History significant blood loss due reason , include blood donation past 3 month . History preexist bleed disorder . Existence surgical medical condition , , judgment chief investigator and/or clinical investigator/physician , might interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug likely compromise safety volunteer . Inability communicate cooperate .
